doc.title: Project: B-Boy/Kujo
doc.plot: Project: B-Boy introduces an amazing, gravity-defying, fluid, physical art form that is currently making a worldwide comeback. This documentary short investigates the inspiration behind 'Krazy Kujo,' a partially deaf break-dancer with a fascinating perspective of life and a matching dance style. He recycles original break-dance moves with martial arts, gymnastics, capoeira, and modern dance. A seamless mix between interviews, footage, and dance segments, Project: B-Boy aims to entertain, educate, and leave the audience in awe. With the right mix of intellect, creativity, and athleticism, it is sure to be embraced by the underground and curious mainstream audience alike.
